text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In an attempt to grow closer to Tosen<n>Jordan, I've started
looking into<n>what's trending these days. Today,<n>I've
made my way to the shopping<n>mall.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huh? What are you doing here?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Checking the trends, huh? But why?<n>Doesn't that stuff just
naturally make<n>its way to you?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Like, your friends will share it, or it<n>shows up on your feed.
They just<n>keep coming, one after another.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
You're taking notes? Just stop.<n>Please. I can't. This is your
day off,<n>yeah? You shouldn't spend it<n>studying and junk.
choice_data_list: Are you here to do some shopping?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I guess so... Actually, if you<n>wanna know the trends, I
know a<n>super easy way to figure that out.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Guess we're switching roles. Today,<n>I'm gonna be your
Trend Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I know it, I'm suddenly<n>embarking upon Trend
Training with<n>Tosen Jordan...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
First stop, the photo booth! Gotta take<n>a pic while my hair
and makeup are<n>still on fleek. A selfie's good too, but<n>
photo booths just hit different, you<n>know?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry about the pose<n>suggestions and all that stuff.
Which<n>one should we do? Better just stick<n>to the usual
for your first time, I guess.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Here. Pose like this. Easy, right?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Stiff much? It's giving dead body.<n>Come on, vibe with me
here. Think,<n>"I'm the cutest in the whole world!"

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Got it? If your heart's not in it, your<n>face will show it. Now
let's try that<n>again. Get into iiit!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Hm... Ah, that top is high-key cute.<n>And it's cropped at
juuust the right<n>length. Adorable as hell.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Are you for real? If I try it on, I'll justwant it more. And do you seethose prices? Little bougie for myallowance. No way.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Instead, I've gotta burn this fit into<n>my mind. Later, I'll try to
find<n>something with a similar vibe that I<n>can actually
afford.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Like, "I won't forget you." Ahaha!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Ha... Would it kill you to laugh at my<n>jokes? Anyway, let's
get going.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ah, that top is such a serve! I'vebeen meaning to grab somethingoversized! And it's so cheap. Yup,you're mine now.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Hm... I can't tell if you've got more<n>cool or warm
undertones... Not that it<n>matters too much. Your glow-up is all<n>
but guaranteed with me in charge.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Let's go with an orange eyeshadow...<n>And a little glitter...
Now some white<n>eyeliner on your waterline. Can't<n>forget
the pink mascara to make your<n>eyes pop!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huh? Come on, if anything, I shouldbe putting on more. If that's howyou're gonna thank me... I'm givingyou a unibrow.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After my impromptu makeover, we<n>spend the rest of the
day hanging out,<n>and I learn more about Jordan's<n>world.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Now that hit the spot. Frappesslap so hard... And the new flavorshere are always on point.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
So? How was today? This is how I<n>always spend my days
off. You know,<n>wandering around, eating and goofing<n>
around on my smartphone.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: But... I'm sure it was a real bore for<n>you, huh?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Low-key... you looked like you were<n>about to burst an artery
most of today.<n>I'm guessing this was all totally<n>foreign to
you, right?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sure, I had a hard time keeping up<n>with all these new
experiences, but I<n>thought I'd hid that well... I guess not.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah. But to be honest, I was<n>so worried about you
that I didn't<n>really have as much fun either.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I mean... It's not like I didn't haveany fun.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, it's pretty clear now, right?<n>We're like, total
opposites. Practically<n>from other planets.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
We're not gonna laugh at the same<n>stuff, so, like, it's okay
to stop trying.
choice_data_list: So you knew what I was doing, huh?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I'm dumb, but I'm not blind.Anyway, I appreciate the thought, so...give it a rest, okay?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: We don't have to vibe outside oftraining. We can just practice and gohome, you know?
choice_data_list: Well, I think I'll keep trying anyway.
Well, I think I'll keep trying anyway.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huh? Why?
choice_data_list: Because I want to know you better.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sure, it was hard to keep up, but the<n>novelty of each
experience kept things<n>interesting.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And in the end, I learned more about<n>Tosen Jordan. Today
was well worth<n>it for that alone, so I tell her as much.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I can tell when you're lying, you<n>know.
choice_data_list:
My face may say otherwise, but my heart speaks
the truth!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Seriously... You are so weird.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Isn't all that studying super boring<n>though? Wouldn't it be
easier just to<n>kick back and relax?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I mean, that's what happened to mewhen I tried watching this!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She pulls out a video rental shop bag<n>and shoves it into my
hands. Looking<n>inside, I find a DVD of Comedy<n>Derby, the
show I told her about.
choice_data_list: Did you watch this for me?
Did you watch this for me?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but I didn't enjoy it. Your sense<n>of humor is hella
sus... But seeing you<n>bomb your UmaTok impression got<n>
me curious.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Do you know how long it's been<n>since I've rented a DVD?
It took sooo<n>much time to find too. Recommend<n>something
online next time.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Come on, why'd that make yousmile?! Anyway, could you return thatDVD for me? I'm out! Thanks for the frappe!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I nod and wave a quick goodbye to<n>her before sitting back,
satisfied.<n>Finally, it feels like I've grown closer<n>to Tosen
Jordan—even if only by a<n>teensy bit.
